name: Adamdavis321.GitHub.io
body:
## Projects

### Column Convertor
The [Column Convertor](columnConvertor.html) is a simple tool to convert a column of data into a comma-separated list. 

### Estimating Scratchpad
The [Estimating Scratchpad](estimating/estimating.html) is a simple web app for estimating software projects. [Here](estimating/estimating.html#explanation) is an explanation of the algorithm it uses. This type of calculation can easily be done in a spreadsheet, and that's where I would recommend doing it. I only developed the Estimating Scratchpad to document the estimation process and try out some new ideas for organizing JavaScript applications.

### Special Characters
This [dynamic table](special_chars/specialCharacters.html) shows the special characters which are defined (named) in HTML. The grouping and notes were added by me. You can select which groups are shown by clicking the check-boxes, and sort the table by clicking on the column headings.

This [dynamic table](special_chars/characterGenerator.html) can show the UTF-8 characters from code point U+0000 to U+2FFF.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
